answers.answer: That's the diabetes test right?? I'm trying to take mine for the 2nd time but idk if my body can handle it..
Try eating a little snack and drinking water before you go.
They said I can't eat or drink anything after midnight
Yeah don't eat anything before you go. And try to go right in the morning so it's easier and you don't have to go so long in the morning without eating.
Yea I go in at 8 when they open and I couldn't do it once again idk why my body can't take it
It has nothing to do with you being over weight. I started at 165 pre pregnancy and I'm only 5'3. So I'm a bit overweight and passed my test. I guess everyone is just different

question: I got a call from my doctors yesterday,and they said the results of my glucose  test is abnormal. Is that normal to happen? I know in,not gaining  alot of weight I'm having weight issues but not over weight.
title: abnormal  glucose  test.
